title: Add Checked Baggage to Flight Booking
description: A customer who already has a flight booking needs to add one piece of checked luggage.

tasks.description: Calculate the cost for one piece of checked baggage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct fee for the luggage.

tasks.description: Add the baggage to the booking and process the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the service and updates the booking.
